Description: Textile fragment; torn strip of undyed, fine weave linen mummy-wrapping bearing Hieroglyphic text; stained with bitumen. The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spliced and S-twisted; the stitch gauge is warp c.43 ends per 10mm and weft c.19 picks per 10mm.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Tomb of Bakenrenef, intrusive burial
Curator's comments: Mosher, Malcom Jr. 2016. The Book of the Dead, Saite through Ptolemaic periods : a study of traditions evident in versions of texts and vignettes (SPBD Studies), vol. I (BD Spells 1-15) and II (BD Spells 16, 18-30), Charleston.
